products.title: Cypress Pumice Vertical Blind

products.description: The brand harlequin oozes sophistication and their harlequin additions pumice sandstone roman blind is no exception. products.title: Pumice Oyster Roman Blind
products.description: A design that exudes luxury, the pumice oyster roman blind softens any scheme, making it a lovely versatile option for modern living. Its a a design that exudes luxury, the pumice oyster roman blind softens any scheme, making it a lovely versatile option for modern living.

products.title: Fustian Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: Straightforward simplicity is sometimes the best way to express your style, and this fustian pumice roman blind is a great example of how that can work. The traditional weave and soft, neutral grey (can we see the merest hint of mushroom in the shade, maybe?) make for a versatile straightforward simplicity is sometimes the best way to express your style, and this fustian pumice roman blind is a great example of how that can work.

products.title: Pumice Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: Sleek, sophisticated and superb style, the pumice oyster roller blind has plenty of contemporary appeal. The quiet elegance of the design and velvet-textured finish brings a comforting and relaxing feel to a space, and we just know it will suit all tastes. products.title: Glencoe Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: What a luxurious little specimen this is. Richly woven and deeply textured fabric that you just want to reach out and touch, in the ever-luxurious form of a roman blind. This is matched by the earthy, rustic shade that strikes a balance between cool grey and soft neutral, making what a luxurious little specimen this is.

products.title: Accents Pumice Roman Blind
products.description: Our cavendish cream roman blind is incredibly popular so we decided to add a little bit of designer style and include a gorgeous skinny border on three sides to add a real touch of sophistication.
